feed.title: Nishant Rayan’s blog
feed.subtitle: Thanks for finding your way through the thick jungles of the internet to my humble cottage. I don't know if you will find all the answers you are looking for in your life's journet but I hope to share the answers I have through this post.

entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.content: Hello World! Thanks for finding your way through the thick jungles of the internet to my humble cottage. I don’t know if you will find all the answers you are looking for in your life’s journet but I hope to share the answers I have through this post.
entry.summary: Hello World! Thanks for finding your way through the thick jungles of the internet to my humble cottage. I don’t know if you will find all the answers you are looking for in your life’s journet but I hope to share the answers I have through this post.
